text:
For robust modules with several groups and several options per group, is there a way to start out with every group collapsed? 
*Some users are getting overwhelmed when they see 3 groups of 10 options (_30 options total_) all laid out at once*

you can set some some conditionals to display or not the fields/group if all of those options are really independent you can try to set the display conditional to not empty. That way they will see options as long as they fill the fields
Good idea <@U7ADCU3BM>, but we already have a lot of that going on too.
